Package de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators

Class PotentialAccumulator

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators.PotentialAccumulator
public class PotentialAccumulator extends Object
Potential accumulator that uses ExtendedAdderGroup instance for accumulative ("+=") operations.
Author:
Achim Zielesny

  • Method Details

    • accumulatePotentials

      public boolean accumulatePotentials(LinkedList<HarmonicBondChunkArrays> aBondChunkArraysList, double[] aR_x, double[] aR_y, double[] aR_z, Parameters aParameters)
      Accumulates potentials to aParameters.getParticleArrays().getCalculationAdders() (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      aBondChunkArraysList - List of bond chunk arrays (may be null)
      aR_x - Current x-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aR_y - Current y-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aR_z - Current z-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aParameters - Parameters
      Returns:
      True: Operation successful, false: Otherwise
